name: JezzGame4
description:
This is a game about hedgehog Jezz and his adventures in the wierd factory, sewerage and space.This game in the deep alpha(today version is A0.3.2.1.1/6M) so if you found any bugs or have some ideas, tell it here.

Now with Multiplayer update.

If you have any questions, visit http://lefadavai.tk or http://forum.jezzgame4.comli.com
